column5: Port Aransas Beach Close, 2 bedroom, 2 bath,unit sleeps 8. Charming & comfortable, King and Trundle in the Master.Queen in the second bedroom. 2 sleeper sofas in the living room. Less than a min drive or 3 min walk to the beach. Pool onsite. Pet friendly & no size or weight limit.Private yard & town.Large lot with 3 units,bring the whole family rent all 3 units.Lots of Parking, boats too.Long Term Bookings accepted .
